Headline: #103 West 103rd Temporary Reroute at 103rd/Talman
ShortDescription: 103 West 103rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 103rd, Talman, 99th, Western, and 103rd due to, street blockage near 103rd/ Talman.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Paxton
